mainBoard.flavorText: The vanguard is skilled at waging war alone. The enemy is often defeated before its reinforcements reach the front.

foreignData.flavorText: Die Vorhut ist in der Lage, einen Kampf alleine zu entscheiden. Der Feind ist oft schon besiegt, bevor die Verstärkungen die Front erreicht haben.
foreignData.name: Elite-Vorhut

foreignData.flavorText: La vanguardia sabe cómo luchar una guerra sola. El enemigo normalmente es derrotado antes de que los refuerzos alcancen el frente.
foreignData.name: Vanguardia de élite

foreignData.flavorText: L'avant-garde sait faire la guerre seule. L'ennemi est souvent vaincu avant que ses renforts n'atteignent le front.
foreignData.name: Avant-garde d'élite

foreignData.flavorText: L'avanguardia è specializzata nel muovere guerra da sola. Il nemico viene spesso sconfitto prima che i rinforzi raggiungano il fronte.
foreignData.name: Avanguardia d'Elite

foreignData.flavorText: 先兵は、一人で戦場を賄える技量を持っている。 援軍が前線に達するよりも先に相手が倒されていることもしばしばだ。
foreignData.name: 先兵の精鋭
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: A vanguarda sabe bem como travar a guerra sozinha. Não é raro que o inimigo seja derrotado antes que seus reforços cheguem ao fronte.
foreignData.name: Vanguarda de Elite

foreignData.flavorText: Передовые отряды умело сражаются в одиночку. Зачастую враг терпит поражение еще до того, как подкрепление достигнет фронта.
foreignData.name: Элитный Авангард

foreignData.flavorText: 先锋对于自行作战相当拿手。 敌人经常在后援部队赶到前就给打败。
foreignData.name: 菁英先锋

mainBoard.name: Elite Vanguard

mainBoard.flavorText: "One does not question the size or shape of the grains of sand in an hourglass. Nor do I question the temperament of the souls under my guidance."

foreignData.flavorText: „Niemand hinterfragt die Größe und die Form der Sandkörner in der Sanduhr. Genauso wenig stört mich das Temperament der Seelen, die ich leite."
foreignData.name: Seelenwächter
foreignData.text: Immer wenn eine andere Kreatur ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 1 Lebenspunkt dazu.

foreignData.flavorText: "Uno no cuestiona la forma o tamaño de los granos de arena en un reloj. Como yo no cuestiono el temperamento de las almas bajo mi tutela."
foreignData.name: Protectora de almas
foreignData.text: Siempre que otra criatura entre al campo de batalla, gana 1 vida.

foreignData.flavorText: « Personne ne conteste la taille ou la forme des grains du sablier. Je ne conteste pas non plus le tempérament des âmes dont je suis la gardienne. »
foreignData.name: Garde des âmes
foreignData.text: À chaque fois qu'une autre créature arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 1 point de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non si contestano le dimensioni o la forma dei granelli di sabbia in una clessidra. Né io contesto il temperamento delle anime sotto la mia guida."
foreignData.name: Guardiana dell'Anima
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta un'altra creatura entra nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 1 punto vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 「砂時計の砂の大きさや形を問う人はいません。 ですから私も、私の導きに従う魂の気質を問うことはしないのです。」
foreignData.name: 魂の管理人
foreignData.text: 他のクリーチャーが１体戦場に出るたび、あなたは１点のライフを得る。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignData.flavorText: "Não se questiona o tamanho ou a forma dos grãos de areia em uma ampulheta. E eu não questiono o temperamento das almas que guio."
foreignData.name: Encarregado das Almas
foreignData.text: Toda vez que outra criatura entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 1 ponto de vida.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мало кого интересует размер и форма песчинок в песочных часах. Так и меня не интересуют темпераменты душ под моей опекой».
foreignData.name: Страж Души
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда другое существо выходит на поле битвы, вы получаете 1 жизнь.

foreignData.flavorText: 「没人会在乎砂漏中的砂粒是怎样的大小与形状。 我也不会在乎该我管教的人脾气是怎么样。」
foreignData.name: 护灵师
foreignData.text: 每当另一个生物进战场时，你获得1点生命。

mainBoard.name: Soul Warden

rulings.text: Does not trigger on a card on the battlefield being changed into a creature.
The ability will not trigger on itself entering the battlefield, but it will trigger on any other creature that is put onto the battlefield at the same time.
Two Soul Wardens entering the battlefield at the same time will each cause the other’s ability to trigger.

mainBoard.text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

mainBoard.flavorText: Hunters of every species on the savannah, silvercoats disdain camouflage in favor of total dominance of the food chain.

foreignData.flavorText: Silberfelle jagen alle anderen Tiere der Savanne. Als Beherrscher der Nahrungskette verschmähen sie jegliche Tarnung.
foreignData.name: Silberfell-Löwe

foreignData.flavorText: Cazadores de todas las especies de la sabana, los manto plateado dejan de lado el camuflaje a cambio de una dominancia total de la cadena alimenticia.
foreignData.name: León manto plateado

foreignData.flavorText: Au sommet de la chaîne alimentaire de la savane, les lions à fourrure argentée se moquent bien du camouflage.
foreignData.name: Lion à fourrure argentée

foreignData.flavorText: Cacciatori di tutte le specie della savana, i leoni dal manto argentato disdegnano il mimetismo in favore di un dominio totale della catena alimentare.
foreignData.name: Leone dal Manto Argentato

foreignData.flavorText: サバンナでのあらゆる種族を狩るものである銀毛は、食物連鎖の頂点に立つものとして迷彩というものを軽蔑している。
foreignData.name: 銀毛のライオン

foreignData.flavorText: Caçadores de todas as espécies na savana, os pele-de-prata desprezam a camuflagem em favor do domínio da cadeia alimentar.
foreignData.name: Leão Pele-de-Prata

foreignData.flavorText: Всеядные охотники саванны, среброшкурые львы пренебрегают защитной окраской, полностью подчинив себе другие виды.
foreignData.name: Среброшкурый Лев

foreignData.flavorText: 银毛狮猎捕草原上各种生物，完全不靠任何伪装，照样主宰整个食物链。
foreignData.name: 银毛狮

mainBoard.name: Silvercoat Lion

mainBoard.flavorText:
"At summer's end, the pegasus herd stampedes across the sky. Their silent footfalls taunt the clouds and bid the rains to come."
—Stormfront fable

foreignData.flavorText: „Wenn der Sommer vergeht, galoppieren die Pegasi über den Himmel. Ihre stillen Hufschläge verhöhnen die Wolken und locken den Regen heran." —Fabel über die Sturmfront
foreignData.name: Sturmfront-Pegasus
foreignData.text: Fliegend

foreignData.flavorText: "Al final del verano, la manada de pegasos corre en estampida por el cielo. Sus silenciosas pisadas se burlan de las nubes y hacen llegar la lluvia." —Fábula del Frente de Tormenta
foreignData.name: Pegaso Frente de Tormenta
foreignData.text: Vuela.

foreignData.flavorText: « Quand l'été touche à sa fin, le troupeau de pégases traverse le ciel au galop. Leurs sabots silencieux frôlent les nuages et appellent la pluie. » —Fable du front de l'orage
foreignData.name: Pégase du front de l'orage
foreignData.text: Vol

foreignData.flavorText: "Alla fine dell'estate, la mandria di pegasi fugge precipitosamente nel cielo. I loro passi silenziosi provocano le nuvole e invitano le piogge a scrosciare." —Leggenda del Fronte della Tempesta
foreignData.name: Pegaso del Fronte della Tempesta
foreignData.text: Volare

foreignData.flavorText: 「夏の終わり、ペガサスの群れが空を駆けていきます。 その静かなる足音は雲を招き、雨を命じるのです。」 ――嵐前線の寓話
foreignData.name: 嵐前線のペガサス
foreignData.text: 飛行
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — ペガサス

foreignData.flavorText: "No fim do verão, a manada de pégasos galopa em sobressalto pelos céus. Os golpes silenciosos das suas patas desmancham as nuvens e invocam as chuvas." —Fábula de Tempestade
foreignData.name: Pégaso da Tempestade
foreignData.text: Voar

foreignData.flavorText: «В конце лета по небу проносится табун пегасов. Их копыта беззвучно задевают облака, вызывая дожди». — предание о шторме
foreignData.name: Штормовой Пегас
foreignData.text: Полет

foreignData.flavorText: 「飞马群在夏末奔掠长空。 无声的蹄响挑动云朵，因此降下了雨。」 ～暴锋寓言
foreignData.name: 暴锋飞马
foreignData.text: 飞行

mainBoard.name: Stormfront Pegasus
mainBoard.text: Flying

mainBoard.flavorText: Once a griffin sentinel adopts a territory as its own, only death can force it to betray its post.

foreignData.flavorText: Sobald ein Greifenwächter ein Gebiet für sich beansprucht hat, kann ihn nur der Tod von seinem Posten entfernen.
foreignData.name: Greifen-Wachposten
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Wachsamkeit (Diese Kreatur wird beim Angreifen nicht getappt.)

foreignData.flavorText: Una vez que un grifo centinela adopta un territorio como propio, sólo la muerte puede obligarlo a dejar su puesto.
foreignData.name: Grifo centinela
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Vigilancia. (Esta criatura no se gira al atacar.)

foreignData.flavorText: Une fois qu'une sentinelle griffon s'approprie un territoire, seule la mort peut la forcer à abandonner son poste.
foreignData.name: Sentinelle griffon
foreignData.text:
Vol
Vigilance (Attaquer avec cette créature ne la fait pas s'engager.)

foreignData.flavorText: Dopo che un grifone sentinella ha fatto proprio un territorio, solo la morte può costringerlo ad abbandonare la sua postazione.
foreignData.name: Grifone Sentinella
foreignData.text:
Volare
Cautela (Questa creatura attacca senza TAPpare.)

foreignData.flavorText: 一度持ち場に着いたグリフィンの歩哨をそこから引き離すことができるのは死だけだ。
foreignData.name: グリフィンの歩哨
foreignData.text:
飛行
警戒 （このクリーチャーは攻撃してもタップしない。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — グリフィン

foreignData.flavorText: Quando um grifo sentinela adota um território como seu, somente a morte pode forçá-lo a trair seu posto.
foreignData.name: Grifo Sentinela
foreignData.text:
Voar
Vigilância (Atacar não faz com que esta criatura seja virada.)

foreignData.flavorText: Если уж грифон взял под свое крыло территорию, только смерть может заставить его покинуть свой пост.
foreignData.name: Грифон-Часовой
foreignData.text:
Полет
Бдительность (При нападении это существо не поворачивается.)

foreignData.flavorText: 一旦哨兵狮鹫认定了自己的领域，便至死都不会离开岗位。
foreignData.name: 哨兵狮鹫
foreignData.text:
飞行
警戒 （此生物攻击时不需横置。）

mainBoard.name: Griffin Sentinel
mainBoard.text:
Flying
Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.)

mainBoard.flavorText: "I'm not nearly as bothered by being outnumbered as I am by their foul stench."

foreignData.flavorText: „Dass sie mehr sind als wir, stört mich nicht, aber dass sie so stinken..."
foreignData.name: Palastwache
foreignData.text: Die Palastwache kann eine beliebige Anzahl an Kreaturen blocken.

foreignData.flavorText: "No estoy tan preocupado por estar en desventaja como lo estoy por su asqueroso hedor."
foreignData.name: Guardia de palacio
foreignData.text: El Guardia de palacio puede bloquear cualquier cantidad de criaturas.

foreignData.flavorText: « Les voir en surnombre ne me dérange pas autant que leur odeur nauséabonde. »
foreignData.name: Garde du palais
foreignData.text: La Garde du palais peut bloquer n'importe quel nombre de créatures.

foreignData.flavorText: "Non sono neanche vagamente infastidito dall'inferiorità numerica quanto lo sono dal loro orribile fetore."
foreignData.name: Guardia di Palazzo
foreignData.text: La Guardia di Palazzo può bloccare un qualsiasi numero di creature.

foreignData.flavorText: 「相手の数よりも、やつらの臭いの方がよっぽど気になるな。」
foreignData.name: 宮殿の護衛
foreignData.text: 宮殿の護衛は、望む数のクリーチャーをブロックできる。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "Estar em desvantagem não me incomoda tanto quanto o fedor pútrido que eles exalam."
foreignData.name: Guarda Palaciano
foreignData.text: Guarda Palaciano pode bloquear um número qualquer de criaturas.

foreignData.flavorText: «Если меня что-то и беспокоит, так это не количество врагов, а исходящее от них невыносимое зловоние».
foreignData.name: Дворцовый Стражник
foreignData.text: Дворцовый Стражник может блокировать любое количество существ.

foreignData.flavorText: 「数量上的劣势还不如他们的体臭来得让我难受。」
foreignData.name: 宫殿守卫
foreignData.text: 宫殿守卫能阻挡任意数量的生物。

mainBoard.name: Palace Guard
mainBoard.text: Palace Guard can block any number of creatures.

mainBoard.flavorText: "My motive is not vengeance but mercy. I deliver the soulless back to their severed souls."

foreignData.flavorText: „Keine Racheglüste, sondern Gnade leitet meine Hand. Ich bringe die Seelenlosen zu ihren Seelen zurück."
foreignData.name: Untoten-Vernichter
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Schicke ein Skelett, einen Vampir oder einen Zombie deiner Wahl ins Exil.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mi motivación no es la venganza sino la piedad. Envío a aquellos sin alma de regreso a sus almas extraviadas."
foreignData.name: Exterminador de muertos vivientes
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Exilia el Esqueleto, Vampiro o Zombie objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Ce n'est point la vengeance mais la pitié qui me motive. Je livre aux âmes les corps dont elles ont été séparées. »
foreignData.name: Tueuse de morts-vivants
foreignData.text: {W}, {T} : Exilez le squelette, le vampire ou le zombie ciblé.

foreignData.flavorText: "Il mio movente non è la vendetta ma la pietà. Rispedisco i senz'anima alle loro anime recise."
foreignData.name: Assassina di Non Morti
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Esilia uno Scheletro, un Vampiro o uno Zombie bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「私は復讐ではなく、慈悲でやっているのです。 この魂無き者たちを、切り離された魂に返してやるのですから。」
foreignData.name: アンデッドを屠る者
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}：スケルトン１つか吸血鬼１つかゾンビ１つを対象とし、それを追放する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignData.flavorText: "Meu motivo não é vingança, e sim misericórdia. Eu levo os desalmados de volta às suas almas extirpadas."
foreignData.name: Assassino de Morto-Vivo
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: Exile o Esqueleto, Vampiro ou Zumbi alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мною движет не месть, а милосердие. Я возвращаю бездушных к их искалеченным душам».
foreignData.name: Истребитель Нежити
foreignData.text: {W}, {T}: изгоните целевого Скелета, Вампира или Зомби.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我的动机并非复仇，而是慈悲。 我要将无魂者带回他们离散的灵魂归宿。」
foreignData.name: 不死生物克星
foreignData.text: {W}，{T}：放逐目标骷髅妖，吸血鬼，或灵俑。

mainBoard.name: Undead Slayer

rulings.text: Undead Slayer’s ability must target a permanent (not a card in the graveyard) with at least one of the listed creature types.

mainBoard.text: {W}, {T}: Exile target Skeleton, Vampire, or Zombie.

mainBoard.flavorText: "What am I looking at? Ashes, dead man."

foreignData.flavorText: „Was ich gerade betrachte? Asche, toter Mann."
foreignData.name: Verschwenderischer Feuerkundler
foreignData.text: {T}: Der Verschwenderische Feuerkundler fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler deiner Wahl 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Qué estoy mirando? Cenizas y un hombre muerto."
foreignData.name: Piromante pródigo
foreignData.text: {T}: El Piromante pródigo hace 1 punto de daño a la criatura o jugador objetivo.

foreignData.flavorText: « Qu'est-ce que c'est ? Tes cendres, moribond. »
foreignData.name: Pyromancien sybarite
foreignData.text: {T} : Le Pyromancien sybarite inflige 1 blessure à une cible, créature ou joueur.

foreignData.flavorText: "Cosa sto guardando? Ceneri, uomo morto."
foreignData.name: Piromante Errante
foreignData.text: {T}: Il Piromante Errante infligge 1 danno a una creatura o a un giocatore bersaglio.

foreignData.flavorText: 「どこ見てるって？ 灰だよ、この死人が。」
foreignData.name: 放蕩紅蓮術士
foreignData.text: {T}：クリーチャー１体かプレイヤー１人を対象とする。放蕩紅蓮術士はそれに１点のダメージを与える。

foreignData.flavorText: "O que estou olhando? Cinzas, homem morto."
foreignData.name: Piromante Pródigo
foreignData.text: {T}: Piromante Pródigo causa 1 ponto de dano à criatura ou ao jogador alvo.

foreignData.flavorText: «На что я смотрю? На пепел, покойник вы мой».
foreignData.name: Гениальный Пиротехник
foreignData.text: {T}: Гениальный Пиротехник наносит 1 повреждение целевому существу или игроку.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我在看什么？ 灰烬，死人。」
foreignData.name: 放荡烈焰术士
foreignData.text: {T}：放荡烈焰术士对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

mainBoard.flavorText: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

mainBoard.name: Harm's Way

rulings.text: As you cast Harm’s Way, you target that the redirected damage will be dealt to. As Harm’s Way resolves, you choose a source of damage. You never choose the original recipient of the damage; Harm’s Way will apply to whatever the chosen source tries to deal damage to, as long as it’s you or a permanent you control.

If the chosen source would deal just 1 damage to you or a permanent you control, Harm’s Way’s effect will redirect that damage and still have a “shield” left for another 1 damage from that source later in the turn.

If the chosen source would simultaneously deal damage to multiple permanents you control (like Pyroclasm could) or to you and at least one permanent you control (like Earthquake could), Harm’s Way will redirect just 2 of that damage. It won’t redirect the next 2 damage that would be dealt to each recipient. You choose which 2 damage is redirected. If you like, you can choose to redirect 1 damage that would be dealt by the chosen source to each of two different recipients.

After Harm’s Way resolves, it no longer checks to see if the target is a legal target. However, if that permanent or player can’t be dealt damage at the time the chosen source would deal damage (perhaps because the creature is no longer on the battlefield or is no longer a creature, or because the player is no longer in the game), the damage can’t be redirected. It’s dealt to the original recipient.
Harm’s Way has no effect on damage that’s already been dealt.

mainBoard.name: Divine Verdict

rulings.text: An “attacking creature” is one that has been declared as an attacker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield attacking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be an attacking creature through the end of combat step, even if the player it was attacking has left the game, or the planeswalker it was attacking has left combat.

A “blocking creature” is one that has been declared as a blocker this combat, or one that was put onto the battlefield blocking this combat. Unless that creature leaves combat, it continues to be a blocking creature through the end of combat step, even if the creature or creatures it was blocking are no longer on the battlefield or have otherwise left combat.
Destroying a blocking creature won’t cause any of the creatures it was blocking to become unblocked. They won’t deal combat damage to the defending player or planeswalker (unless they have trample).

mainBoard.name: Armored Ascension

rulings.text: This ability counts the number of Plains controlled by Armored Ascension’s controller, not the enchanted creature’s controller (in case they’re different players).
This bonus is not fixed; it changes as the number of Plains you control changes.
The ability cares about lands with the land type Plains, not necessarily lands named Plains.
